reviews.comments: Súper recomendable,  hermoso lugar e inmejorable ubicación!!
excelente barrio y departamento muy tranquilo

El departamento es perfecto, igual a las fotos y la zona es la mejor
Tony es excelente atento a cualquier consulta que tuve igual que yanina 
Lo recomiendo y espero volver pronto.

La zona muy buena. El departamento impecable con un ventanal hermoso. Todo muy limpio. Totalmente veraz. La cama cómoda. El agua a temperatura ideal. Gracias Yanina y Tony por la atención. Volveremos!
Hermosa zona y depto. Cerca del subterráneo y bares y zonas de interés y de parada de bus turístico.  muy seguro y silencioso. El trato exelente. Gracias
muy lindo y el barrio tranquilo y seguro. lo recomiendo!
Excelente todo. El departamento es muy lindo y bien ubicado. La atención de Yanina también fue óptima.

Buena ubicacion, zona tranquila y segura. No tan ruidosa como otras y accesible al transporte público caminando algunas cuadras.
Variedad de restaurantes y cafés por la zona.
El depto es pequeño, en un edificio dentro de todo nuevo y está bien para 1 a 2 personas.
Tiene las comodidades básicas como para pasar algunos dias en la ciudad, la limpieza del lugar no era la mejor pero si aceptable.
El trato con el anfitrión fue cordial y amable.
Excelente departamento por ubicación y equipamiento (loza radiante, anafe eléctrico, horno eléctrico, heladera, y demás...). Zona segura para caminar, con bares y restaurante muy cerca. Volveremos.
Excelente ubicación, trato y comodidades. Altamente recomendable!
Muy buena zona , comunicación y atención .
Excelente trato, y flexibles con nuestros horarios ! Totalmente recomendable

Hermoso departamento. La ubicación es espectacular. Mucho espacio verde cerca y a su vez caminando un poco se llega rápido a muchos de los puntos de atracción turística de la ciudad!!! El anfitrión fue muy amable y estuvo siempre muy bien predispuesto. Muy recomendable.

La verdad que la ubicación , limpieza y comodidad estás cual lo describen, es altamente recomendable , y de volver a Bs as buscaría este departamento, gracias 

Martín
El lugar excelente y re tranquilo. Ezequiel nos atendió muy bien!!! Y estuvo en cada detalle. De hecho mi avión llegó re tarde a la noche y el estaba ahí esperándome!!!

Gracias Tomás por la atención, ya que fue la persona que nos recibió. Muy contentos con el departamento es tal cual lo que se ve en la fotos, barrio residencial, seguro para caminar por la noche. Para tener en cuenta hay que caminar varias cuadras hasta subte, pero no es problema porque es muy linda la zona para caminar, lo recomiendo y volveríamos!

Tomas fue un excelente anfitrión, el departamento tal cual la foto, la ubicación es especial para aquellos que quieran un fin de semana tranquilo, cerca del jardin botánico, muchas tiendas y restaurantes alrededor. Excelente

Excelente zona, el departamento era tal cual la descripción y los servicios con los que contaba .
Muy buen recicbimiento y despedida por parte del  anfitrión
Excelente. Muy atento a cualquier necesidad.

El departamento es tal  cual las fotos, nos recibieron excelentemente y la pasamos increíble, la ubicación es ideal en un barrio sumamente tranquilo y con opciones gastronómicas variadas. Recomiendo vivir la experiencia 100%.
Yanina se porto de diez. La casa es excelente con mucha luz y moderna, la ubicación simplemente genial y todo es según las fotos. Muchísimas gracias por todo!

El departamento es muy confortable y acogedor, sencillo y con todo lo necesario para una buena estadia. El barrio me parecio excelente y muy seguro ante todo, al igual que el edificio donde se encuentra el dpto. A mi criterio es mejor que cualquier hotel y mas economico. Me gustó y lo recomendaré a todas las personas que tengan que viajar a Buenos Aires. Gracias.

Nos quedamos 9 dias en el departamento y lo pasamos increible. Es comodo, acojedor, con una linda vista y la zona es la mejor de buenos aires en mi opinion. La velocidad de respuesta fue rapida tambien. Volveria a quedarme en este departamento.
Un hermoso lugar y sector para hospedarse en Buenos Aires.  Me enamoré de esta ciudad desde el balcón del departamento.
Apartamento fiel a las descripciones de La foto. Bien ubicado.

El departamento estaba impecablemente limpio, ordenado, es muy cómodo aunque no sea grande, lindo, buena vista ya que enfrente hay unas torres alejadas, amplio balcón muy disfrutable. El barrio es agradable también, es un barrio caro pero hay de todo para comprar cualquier cosa, y está bastante bien conectado y muy cerca de enormes parques. Perfecta la comunicación, y flexibilidad con los horarios para entrar y salir. Seguro volvería.
Buena ubicación, limpio

Excelente ubicación, el apartamento súper limpio, ordenado y cómodo. Quien nos recibió fue muy amable y atento. 
Está cerca de lugares para cenar, hacer compras o simplemente conocer la ciudad. Muy recomendable!

Departamento muy cómodo con lo necesario para una cómoda estadía! Nuestro anfitrión fue Tomás, quien siempre estuvo atento a cualquier consulta.  El barrio es exquisito... recórranlo y disfruten! La gente muy agradable en BAires...

Pasamos muy bien en el apto de Yanina, muy comodo y super bien ubicado. Comtamos con elementos de cocina y todo lo que necesitamos. Salimos a comer a buenos restaurantes cercanos, el subte y comercio son a pocas cuadras como sitios de interés. Siempre estuvieron dispuestos a ayudarnos en todo lo que necesitamos.

Nos atendió Tomas, excelente huésped muy atento a todo. La primera impresión del lugar es fantástica, súper cómodo, muy buena ubicación y muy luminoso.
Tiene todo lo que podes necesitar para quedarte varios días y cocinar.

Muchas gracias!
Todo bien. Nos atendió Tomás.... muy gentil y amable. Gracias por todo.

Mi esposo, nuestro bebe y mi persona acabamos de regresar de una estadia de 3 semanas en Argentina y puedo asegurar que este fue el mejor de los 3 alojamientos en los que estuvimos. 
La ubicacion es excelente! Hay una gran variedad de tiendas, farmacias, supermercados y restaurantes (Bakano fue nuestro favorito) muy cerca de aca y el vecindario es hermoso. Los arboles que estan frente al balcon te dan un agradable toque de naturaleza en medio de una impresionante jungla de concreto
Yanina no estaba en Buenos Aires en el momento de nuestra estadia pero siempre estuvo pendiente de nosotros y sus respuestas fueron super rapidas! Ademas Ezequiel, quien fue el que nos recibio en su lugar, fue lo mas servicial, atento e informativo posible lo cual nos hizo sentir seguros y comodos.
El apartamento es perfecto para 2, con una decoracion lindisima, muy fresco y bien iluminado.
Se lo recomiendo a cualquiera que quiera pasar una grata estadia en una ciudad tan bella como Buenos Aires.
Pura vida!

El departamento es bonito y está bien ubicado! (Aunque hay que saber que hasta la próxima parada del metro hay que caminar 10-15 min. - lo que a nosotros no nos importaba...) 
La comunicación con Ezequiel era fácil y ha sido un placer pasar unos días allá en Palermo!
El apartamento es tal cual como las fotos. Muy luminoso y con todas las comodidades. Lo recomiendo ampliamente. Felicito a Exequiel que es quien te recibe por la excelente atencion.

El dia que llegamos nos dio la bienvenida Exequiel. Un chico encantador que nos entrego las llaves y explico el funcionamiento del apartamento y respondio a todas nuestras preguntas, los mejores lugares para comer en Palermo etc. etc. El apartamento tiene todo lo que uno necesita y esta muy bien ubicado. Si regresamos a B.A. sin duda que lo reservariamos denuevo! Lo recomendamos :-)

Para los que quieran disfrutar de un buen lugar, este es, las fotos tal cual son, la ubicación muy buena; BA es muy amplio y el Barrio Palermo igual; por eso este sitio está muy bien situado, con muchas cosas cerca; los alrededores increíbles; nos sentimos muy a gusto. Con toda seguridad cuando volvamos nos quedaremos nuevamente. Tomás, gracias por todo. Estuvo atento a cualquier quietud.

La ubicación es muy buena, el apartamento es cómodo y tiene todo lo necesario para una estadía en Buenos Aires. Tomás fue muy amable con nosotros, nos dió indicaciones del lugar y siempre estuvo atento por mensaje. Muy recomendable.

Yanina fue muy amable en todo momento al igual que Tomas el cual nos ofreció su ayuda para distintas cosas con muy buena voluntad. El apartamento se ve tal cual es en las fotos, cómodo, limpio, iluminado, amplio y el barrio lleno de lugares donde salir a comer. Cuando vuelva a Bs. as. No dudaría en volver a quedarme ahí. Muchas gracias por todo Yanina y Tomas !!!!

Tomas fue un anfitrion excelente
Nos dio recomendaciones de todo tipo y no dejo de comunicarse con nosotros en ningun momento

La casa estaba tal cual la esperabamos; PRECIOSA! Comoda y en muy buena ubicacion, a tan solo 5min del parque 3 de Febrero a la altura del jardín japones
Buenísimo el departamento y también la atención y disposición de Tomás para entregar y recibir el lugar y para dar consejos. Gracias por todo!

Fue una experiencia inigualable, el departamento estaba muy bien equipado, es mucho mejor que en las fotos, de hecho ya lo extraño :(
Tomas se porto muy bien con nosotros, fue muy amable y estuvo 100% disponible en todo momento, nos dio muy buenos consejos para recorrer la ciudad y sus alrededores. TOTALMENTE RECOMIENDO EL APARTAMENTO , el barrio ademas es muy bueno y Yanina también siempre estuvo disponible

Nos sentimos muy bien! Tanto en la casa como en el barrio. Muchas gracias. El servicio de entrega y check out fue muy bueno, y la gente muy amable, tanto Tomas como Marcela. Gracias por la estadía! Lo recomendaría!

Excelente departamento para una pareja, super bien ubicado en una zona residencial. Yanina estuvo siempre disponible para nosotros, nos dejaron toallas, jabon y todo lo necesario para estar comodos. 
Tomas nos abrió la puerta e hicimos el check out con el todo muy bien gestionado.
Lo recomiendo!! Excelente!

My parents stayed at the Airbnb and they really enjoyed it. The location is safe with lots of restaurants, parks and bars near by. The neighborhood is quiet and the apartment was super comfy. They don't have any negative comments and wished they could have stayed longer.
This place was just as described! Clean and close to public transportation. I would recommend this place to everyone looking for a place in Buenos Aires
This is a great location and value! You won’t be disappointed!

Adoramos o fato do apartamento ter uma ótima localização, em um bairro bem tranquilo e seguro, com muitas opções de bares e restaurantes por perto e boa acessibilidade. 

O que nos incomodou foram os descuidos com os detalhes. Parecia que a roupa de cama não era lavada e o lixo do banheiro não havia sido retirado da estadia anterior a nossa! Da a impressão de que a limpeza é feita bem superficialmente, algo que particularmente me desagradou muito e me senti bem desconfortável. O banheiro fica muito molhado depois do banho, uma solução que encontramos foi de colocar a cortina pra dentro da banheira. 

Tivemos um probleminha com a privada que parou de funcionar, mas a Yanina foi bem rápida em nos responder e nos ajudar. O apartamento é ótimo, mas com alguns cuidados e mais atenção iria ficar melhor ainda.
Lovely little studio. The balcony was my favorite part! The neighborhood was very nice - safe to walk around & amazing restaurants. I highly recommend staying in this flat!

O apartamento é apenas para locação, não parece morar ninguém lá, e por isso esta um pouco batido. Localização de primeira e ótimo custo-benefício. Ter que buscar a chave em outro bairro cansados da viagem foi um pouco chato e teve um custo alto de táxi porém depois o Tony (cara que de fato cuida do apartamento) foi muito prestativo e esse entremeio do início foi esquecido. Totalmente recomendado.

The place was walking distance to MALBA and the Evita museum which was nice for first-time visitors of Buenos Aires. It's a 20ish minute walk to some of the really good restaurants in Palermo so I think next time I stay, I'd like to stay more in Palermo Soho. 

Overall, the place was very clean. I had to arrange a pickup of keys with Tony since our flight got in at 12am and it went smoothly. Would be nice if there was some basic cooking stuff (like oil and pepper) but we only cooked a few times during our visit. Yanina was quick to respond for any issues that came up so it was an easy stay. Thanks for everything!
I appreciated the accuracy of the pictures and description of the apartment. Everything went very well. It's at a great location in Palermo! I highly recommend it!
Nicely located flat but unfortunately for our visit was offered in a poorly presented state . General cleanliness and lack of comfort was a real issue
Yanina was a very helpful host . The apartment is well located and we really enjoyed our stay

Apartamento muito bonito e aconchegante, ideal para duas pessoas. Localização excelente, próximo dos bosques de Palermo, restaurantes e bares. Tony foi muito atencioso e prestativo. Vamos indicar este apartamento  nossos familiares e amigos!
The place is well located, but is a bit rundown, and cleanness wasnt something to remark blankets and towels filthy its a pity the place has potential and is well located
Lugar ótimo muito bem localizado indico com certeza.

This place is in a great location. However we had a few little issues such as the toilet cistern running all night and having to manually turn off the cistern, only one bedside light, and only one lightbulb working in the living area. We had one towel to share between two of us as there was only one other and although it was folded it was either badly stained or not clean.  Also had we cooked there we would have needed to buy more dishwash liquid as there was only a tiny amount in the bottle.  There was no soap provided in the shower. The location was great, however you need to understand that you will have to sort most other things for yourself, which was awkward for us as we had come from another country far away so we didn't want to be sorting these things upon our arrival.
Turns out the place wasn't available in the end so I stayed elsewhere

Our stay was ok - 
Pros: The apartment location is the best there is in the city. Surrounded by public transport, lot's of shopping center, food market and parks - all walking distance. Communication was very good - quick replies, easy responds.

Cons: No Toilet Paper!! (I am probably the 3rd or 4th renter that is complaining about this.),  the bathroom is very very tiny, in the kitchen the dish soap and sponge were old and moldy... We went and bought them all. The toilet was licking the first 48 hours of our arrival, the person in charge, Tony, came and fixed it. He was efficient. The apartment was very very dusty, we have found old items and hairs of older renters... 

At check out, we were locked in the lobby, cause you need a key to open
the front door of the building to come in and out, that lead to the street, so at 5 Am we were locked inside the building. (The keys we had were locked inside the apartment cause we did check out) We finally woke up someone form the building that let us out and we had to call for an other uber to come take us to the airport. 

Nice place, nice people but the apartment is far from being organize and well  maintain - too bad.

Location was great and apartment was perfect size for two travelers. The toilet had a leak and there wasn't a supply of toilet paper but we made do because we were not in the apartment much. Great location, safe building, and the communication was wonderful with Yanina. Would stay again if I was traveling and wasn't going to be in the room much.

O apartamento é excelente para 1 ou 2 pessoas, tem uma varanda ampla e a localização é perfeita. Vários restaurantes bons por perto, supermercados, cafés e a região é  bem tranquila, fizemos muitas coisas a pé mesmo.
Só recomendo avisar certinho o horário de chegada  ao apartamento antes para o proprietário, porque a noite o prédio não tem porteiro e pode ser que você tenha que ir até a casa dele buscar as chaves. 
O Tony que cuida do apartamento é super atencioso e até nos ajudou ficando com as bagagens para que pudéssemos aproveitar o último dia.
Good location

Yanina is a great host and her communication is fantastic. The location is great and very walk-able as it is in the heart of a restaurant and shopping district as well as close to many of the parks. Overall the place is nice but could use some additional cleaning as the shower curtain was moldy, there was no toilet paper or garbage bags in the house so we had to run to the market for some basic supplies that are generally provided. Overall decent place in a nice location and its affordable... but wasnt very clean when we arrived and lacked basic supplies, also no direction on what to do with garbage. Host was great but I think we will be looking elsewhere on our next trip to BA.

Das Apartment von Janina ist sehr gut gelegen und in der Nähe gibt es einige Restaurants und Cafés, einen Supermarkt, einen Wäscheservice und alles was man sonst braucht. Wir haben die Stadt mehr oder weniger zu Fuss erkundet, zur Metro-Station sind es um die 10 Minuten zu Fuss. Das Apartment ist sehr geräumig und hell, auf den zweiten Blick hat sich allerdings etwas viel Staub angesammelt. Die Kommunikation mit Janina war einwandfrei, wir haben sie aber nicht persönlich getroffen, sondern wurden von Toni sehr freundlich empfangen.
A localização é excelente, a varanda é ótima, porém a higiene/limpeza do apartamento deixou a desejar, assim como o banheiro, a cama, os lençóis e as toalhas!

The apartment is in a great neighbourhood, close to public transport stops and it is also very easy to find a cab. There are a lot of groceries stores, restaurants and bars near by. Yanina answer very quickly yo all my concerns and Tony was very welcoming.
A great apartment in the heart of Palermo. The check in and and check out process was a breeze. Would definitely stay here again!

This apartment has a killer location in Palermo. Close to the Jardín Japonés en Buenos Aires as well as El Rosedal. In addition, the building in which the apt is located is very nice. Quick access to taxi cabs and local grocery stores. I'd definitely recommend this place.

Overall the area was great but the place could use a bit of a tidy up. The shower curtain hasn't been washed in a very long time. Yanina was always quick to respond and helpful but with never meeting her it was difficult to explain about the house.
Apartamento muito bom e com ótima localização.

We hadden een aangenaam verblijf en jullie waren zeer geduldig met onze verwarrende aankomst. We werden goed ontvangen op het appartement en goed ingelicht over de vele mogelijkheden. De buurt was veilig en gemakkelijk terug te vinden na onze bezoekjes in el Centro, San Telmo, la Boca, en Palermo....Bedankt voor jullie gastvrijheid. Christel en Jan
Pela segunda vez me hospedei com meu marido no apartamento e foi tudo perfeito. O bairro é excelente e o apartamento delicioso!

Great location. Overall good experience. Lovely wooden floors, big windows and nice balcony. Bathroom needs some work (ceiling paint is peeling) though shower was nice and had good pressure. Never met Yanina since she was not in BA but her friend Ezequiel was awesome!

If you are interested in the beauty of the outdoors from busy but fun BA, you'll love the miles of parks, bike trails and lakes close by. We rented bikes and biked everywhere. The view from the apartment is beautiful and peaceful.

Our best Airbnb stay ever. In a city where our Spanish was a little rusty, our host extremely helpful and flexible. Great apartment and beautiful outlook and neighbourhood. Lots of amazing restaurants close by.
Ezequiel who works with Yanina was very helpful and even was there super early for our check out!! Great apartment in an awesome location in the city!!

This is a great place to stay in a lovely, safe location. There are lots of local coffee shops, cafes, bars and restaurants and we found it an easy place to navigate around Buenos Aires from. Yanina was not in BA, but her friend Ezequiel gave us the best welcome possible (even though our delayed flight got us there at 2am!). He was very friendly and thorough and gave us some good advice about getting around and the local area. We really enjoyed our stay and would recommend this apartment.

Yanina's place was perfect for a few days in Buenos Aires! The neighbourhood is good - safe and close to all amenities. The flat was clean and had everything we needed. We were met by Ezequiel who was incredibly welcoming, helpful and friendly - a lovely start to our holiday in Argentina.
Posizione perfetta e disponibilità a risolvere qualsiasi problema!!!

Perhaps the best possible location in Buenos Aires. A very safe neighborhood. Close to Soho, flea markets, parks, and wonderful coffee shops.  I can't imagine staying in any other location. Cool, quiet, tree-lined street just a short hop from a grocery store.  AAA+++
The house was nice and clean. Nearby facilities were also good. The terrace and the tree made wonderful scenery. Thanks to you. I've enjoyed myself happily.
We had a great stay at Yanina's. Lovely apartment in great location and the host that welcomed us was very friendly and helpful.

We had an amazing stay at the apartment. It was perfect for what we needed and our hosts were friendly, helpful and accommodating - couldn't have asked for more. The apartment itself is well located, clean and well furnished too. Thanks very much for making our stay an excellent one!
Nice apartment in a good neighborhood. The balcony is very nice to sit and relax. The host is very welcoming and helpful.

The apartment in Palermo was clean and comfortable. It's in a great location, and the leafy environment is very relaxing. 

Ezekiel was the perfect host. He was flexible with times, and very charming. Thank you, we loved our stay in Buenos Aires.
Fijn appartement met een voorkomende gastheer. Een warm welkom in BA. Ook de omgeving is fijn: veilig en met leuke restaurantjes, mooie parken.

Yanina's place is perfectly located close to many of the city sights. Tomas was extra great with accommodating check out times and even brought me an umbrella to check-in since it was storming that day.  Would definitely stay here again!
The host canceled this reservation the day before arrival. This is an automated posting.

I spent 2 weeks in Yanina's apartment. I didn't meet her in person but my interaction with her was very reliable. Her friend Tomas arranged the check in/out and he was very helpful and easy to communicate. The apartment is found in a really awesome area with everything (restaurants, grocery, pharmacy, bars, laundry, really everything) needed in less than 5 minutes walking distance. There's good connection to busses and the metro is a a few blocks away. It's a fully safe area, pretty upscale I'd say, which is nice. Another big advantage is that the place is close to Palermo parcs in case you're into running as I am :-) .

 Other people commented about the noisy fridge, I confirm it can be a little annoying for the sensitive sleepers.
The apartment is amazing. It's located in a great area and is full of life.

Fomos muito bem recebidos! O apartamento é agradável, claro, limpo e bem organizado. Fica localizado em uma região de fácil acesso e extremamente agradável, próximo ao bosque, Jardim Japonês, restaurantes, mercados e etc. Adoramos o período que ficamos no apartamento da Yanina!
I was made to feel welcome and at home at Yanina's place. Everything was very clean, the neighborhood was lovely and walkable and I very much enjoyed my stay!

nice flat, exactly as shown, huge glass front, perfect bathroom and shower, pleasant floor heating if you happen to be there during the southern winter. Found fridge slightly noisy at night, but I get disturbed easily by this in other one room flats as well. This is not the picturesque turn of the century Buenos Aires, rather a modern upper middle class  apartment building neighborhood, but very pleasant and lively. Hosts very friendly, very helpful with timing in my case. Would sure come back.

O apartamento de Yanina é perfeito. Localização excepcional, um janelão que dá para uma árvore linda, totalmente equipado com tudo que é necessário para uma estadia agradabilíssima numa cidade adorável. Fomos muito bem recepcionados por Ezequiel que nos explicou todos os detalhes do apartamento e se colocou à disposição para esclarecer  qualquer dúvida que tivéssemos. Adoramos a experiência e voltaremos sem dúvida.
Nice, clean location in a wonderful neighborhood near shops and restaurants. Very convenient. The host was very responsive to communication before, during and after our stay.
Very good place to stay and visit the city

We had a wonderful stay at this charming and cozy loft in Palermo!

Everything was simply perfect. When we arrived, Ezequiel (who works with Yanina) was there to greet us the moment we stepped out of our cab. He gladly showed us around the apartment and gave us his phone/(SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) for convenience. 

The apartment has heating that comes from the floor (we loved this), the bathroom was neat and everything just worked. The surroundings are quiet, calm and safe, yet close to many interesting places like parks, museums, etc.

We are forever grateful for the fantastic experience we had in Buenos Aires, specially in part thanks to this place. What a great find!

Great spot and apartment that was perfect for us. We really liked that there was nice light and trees right outside. Also that we could access some great museums, art galleries, cafes and restaurants as well as the open space for exercising.

The apartment was exactly as described  
Check in with  Ezekiel went very smoothly and he was very informative. 
We enjoyed our time in  BA and liked the area. Would definitely return.
